comments.content:
Why the Other Options Are Incorrect:
A. Configure the ACL name on the anchor controller:

While ACLs can be used to control traffic, they are not directly related to the redirection process for CWA.

B. Enable DHCP option 7:

DHCP option 7 is used to specify the log server for DHCP clients. It is not related to the redirection process for CWA.

D. Remove the CN entry from the SAN:

The CN (Common Name) entry in the SAN (Subject Alternative Name) is related to SSL certificates and is not relevant to the redirection process for CWA.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
For a device to be correctly redirected to the Central Web Authentication (CWA) portal, ICMP (Internet Control Message Protocol) must be allowed toward the portal. Here's why:

ICMP and Redirection:

When a device connects to the guest network, the WLC uses ICMP to determine if the device can reach the CWA portal. If ICMP is blocked, the WLC cannot verify the portal's reachability, and redirection will fail.

Importance of ICMP:

Allowing ICMP ensures that the WLC can successfully redirect the device to the CWA portal for authentication.

questions.question_text: An engineer is configuring wireless guests using Cisco CWA. When a device connects, it must be redirected to the WebAuth, but this was failing. What must be configured for the device to be redirected correctly?

choices.D: Remove the CN entry from the SAN.
choices.A: Configure the ACL name on the anchor controller.

questions.question_text: An engineer implements QoS on an AireOS WLC v8.3. When configuring AVC on a WLAN, the engineer must configure the appropriate AVC profile for a Cisco Wireless IP Phone 8821, Which command must be used?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
When configuring QoS (Quality of Service) on an AireOS WLC (v8.3), the Cisco Wireless IP Phone 8821 requires the correct DSCP marking for voice traffic.

DSCP (Differentiated Services Code Point) 46 corresponds to Expedited Forwarding (EF), which is the standard marking for voice traffic in QoS.
The command ensures that Cisco phone audio traffic is marked correctly for high-priority treatment on the network.

choices.B: config avc profile AUTOQOS-AVC-PROFILE rule add application cisco-phone-audio mark 56
choices.D: config avc profile AUTOQOS-AVC-PROFILE rule add application cisco-phone-audio mark 48
choices.C: config avc profile AUTOQOS-AVC-PROFILE rule add application cisco-phone-audio mark 46
choices.A: config avc profile AUTOQOS-AVC-PROFILE rule add application cisco-phone-audio mark 41

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Radio Measurement Requests are part of the CCX (Cisco Client Extensions) protocol, specifically CCXv3, which allows the WLC to request clients to perform radio measurements. These measurements help track client locations more accurately and frequently, especially when clients roam between APs.

This feature is essential for maintaining location accuracy for CCXv3 clients while still supporting non-CCX and CCXv1 clients.

Why not the others?
A. Location Calibration: This is used to fine-tune the location accuracy of the WLC by calibrating the environment, but it does not directly address tracking clients at regular intervals or during roaming.

B. 802.11u MSAP: This is related to Hotspot 2.0 and network discovery, not client tracking or location services.

D. Mobile Concierge: This is a feature for providing location-based services and notifications, but it does not directly handle the tracking of clients at regular intervals or during roaming.

questions.question_text: An engineer is configuring location services on a Cisco AireOS 8.5 WLC with CCXv3 and Cisco 3800 Series APs. CCX clients must be tracked closely at regular intervals and whenever they roam to anew AP. Non-CCX and CCXv1 clients must also be tracked. What must be configured?

A company has a Cisco 5500 WLC running 8.0 code with 20 access points installed. Company policy dictates that the wireless network must use 802.1x. They do not have a RADIUS server and decide to use the Local EAP feature on the WLC. Which two EAP methods are available to the company using this method? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BE
Local EAP allows the WLC to act as a local authentication server for wireless clients, supporting specific EAP methods without requiring an external RADIUS server.

PEAP and EAP-FAST are the two EAP methods supported by Local EAP on the WLC. These methods provide secure authentication for wireless clients.

Why not the others?
A. TKIP: This is an encryption protocol, not an EAP method.

C. EAP-MDS: This is not a valid EAP method.

D. WEP: This is an outdated encryption protocol, not an EAP method.

choices.D: switchport mode access mls qos trust dscp
choices.B: switchport mode access mls qos trust device cisco-phone
choices.C: switchport mode access mls qos trust cos
choices.A: switchport encapsulation dot1q switchport mode trunk mls qos trust device cisco-phone

questions.question_text: What is the Cisco recommended configuration for a Cisco switch port connected to an AP in local mode for optimal voice over WLAN performance with an 8821 wireless phone?

discussion.content:
The question asks that the switch configuration should be for the AP not the WLC so...from the link provided: 
Enable DSCP trust for Cisco Access Points 
mls qos 
! 
interface X mls qos trust dscp

Selected Answer: C
C. switchport mode access mls qos trust cos
This configuration ensures that the switch port operates in access mode and trusts the Class of Service (CoS) values from the AP, which is critical for maintaining proper QoS for voice traffic.
D. switchport mode access mls qos trust dscp: While DSCP trust is important, CoS trust is specifically recommended for VoWLAN with Cisco 8821 phones.

Selected Answer: D
From the link provided, D is correct. On p. 40
Enable DSCP trust for Cisco Access Points
mls qos
interface X
mls qos trust dscp

Selected Answer: D
Enable DSCP trust for Cisco Access Points
mls qos
!
interface X
mls qos trust dscp

Selected Answer: D
For AP QoS on Switchport: DSCP is used
For Controller QoS on Switchport: CoS is used.
Because this asks for AP, the right answer is D

Selected Answer: D
Cisco Cert guide says " DSCP is the preferred mothod of QoS trust"

Selected Answer: D
Enable DSCP trust for Cisco Access Points

Selected Answer: D
Answer D

Enable COS trust for Cisco Wireless LAN Controller
mls qos
!
interface X
mls qos trust cos
